ollama.title: Ollama Setup Tutorial
ollama.subtitle: Connect Screenshot (App) Maker to your own Ollama instance for AI translation and text generation.
requirements: A Mac, Windows PC, or Linux machine to run Ollama
Your iPhone/iPad on the same network as the Ollama machine (recommended)
steps: Install Ollama: download and install Ollama for your OS.
Start Ollama: run ollama serve (or open the Ollama app on macOS).
Pull a model: run ollama pull llama3.2 (or your preferred model).
Confirm it works: run ollama run llama3.2 and test a prompt.
Find your server address: note your computer's LAN IP (e.g. 192.168.0.10).
Use it in the app: in Screenshot (App) Maker settings, set Host to http://<LAN-IP>:11434.
notes: If the app cannot connect, check that your phone and computer are on the same Wi‑Fi network.
Make sure port 11434 is allowed by your firewall.
If you prefer to use a remote server (home PC, VPS), you must expose the port securely (VPN recommended).

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: This Privacy Policy describes how Screenshot (App) Maker ("the App") handles user data.
summary: No accounts. No analytics. No tracking.
Your files and edits stay on your device unless you choose to connect to your own Ollama server.
If you use Ollama, text is sent only to the server address you configure.

sections.title: Information Collection
body: The App does not collect, store, or transmit personal information to our servers.
Screenshots, templates, and exported images are created and saved locally on your device.

sections.title: Files and Photos Access
body: The App may request access to the Files app or your photo library to import screenshots.
Imported images are processed on-device and are not uploaded automatically.

sections.title: AI Translation (Ollama)
body: If you enable AI text generation or translation, the App can send text to an Ollama server that you configure (for example, your own computer).
We do not operate or receive your Ollama traffic, and the App does not log or store the text processed by AI.

sections.title: Third-Party Services
body: The App does not use third-party analytics, advertising SDKs, or tracking technologies.

sections.title: Changes
body: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Changes will be reflected on this page.

sections.title: Contact
body: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us via the email address provided on the App Store listing.
